opendial.datastructs

Class Intervals<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.datastructs.Intervals<T>

  • public class Intervals<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a collection of intervals, each of which is associated with a content object, and start and end values. The difference between the start and end values of an interval can for instance represent the object probability.

    The intervals can then be used for sampling a content object according to the defined intervals.

    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-11-02 15:56:09 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

          throws DialException
        Creates a new interval collection with a collection of values and a function specifying the probability of each value
        Parameters:
        content - the collection of content objects
        probs - the function associating a weight to each object
        Throws:
        DialException - if the intervals could not be created

         throws DialException
